source.7014bdb4:
# MLJAR AutoML ECO

The version of MLJAR AutoML with reduced carbon footprint. Not running on all columns. Thus, computation should be faster and final model should generalize better.

MLJAR GitHub: https://github.com/mljar/mljar-supervised
